SESSION.DESCRIPTION:
Loads the Hourly Volume Fact table from flat file sources on the WIM server.
Sources: IRDClassFileList.txt, DiamondFilelist.txt Both sources are filelists, so the "Source File Type" has to be set to indirect. This means that the session is not just reading a single file, but is reading/processing all the files in the list.
SESSION.NAME: s_HourlyVolume

SESSION.DESCRIPTION:
Reverse Seattle CDR File List are the Seattle counters for express Highway that open and close in one direction, in a different time of one day. To process Reverse Seattle CDR Files, we want to identify these counters from the rest of other Seattle CDR File List by issuing a rename command early in the work flow Command Transformation cmdCreateIRDandDiamondFileList to change the name from .TRP to .REV, after processing Reverse files will be deleted later in the work flow cmdDeleteWorkingFiles.
This task will process reverse data differently than the previous HourlyVolumeFourBin. We're adding each of the four bin counter data in all lanes and directions, than the total will be divide and equally distributed back to all lanes and if we have a remainder it will be added to the first lane.
SESSION.NAME: s_HourlyVolumeFourBinRev

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION:
Reverse Seattle CDR File List are the Seattle counters for express Highway that open and close in one direction, in a different time of one day. To process Reverse Seattle CDR Files, we want to identify these counters from the rest of other Seattle CDR File List by issuing a rename command early in the work flow Command Transformation cmdCreateIRDandDiamondFileList to change the name from .TRP to .REV, after processing Reverse files will be deleted later in the work flow cmdDeleteWorkingFiles.
This task will process reverse data differently than the previous HourlyVolumeFourBin. We're adding each of the four bin counter data in all lanes and directions, than the total will be divide and equally distributed back to all lanes and if we have a remainder it will be added to the first lane.
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_HourlyVolumeFourBinRev

TASK.DESCRIPTION:
This command task runs the following commands in order to generate the file sources that will be used in subsequent sessions. Its purpose is to search through the InformaticaLoad directory that Tony populates and builds a list of all the files for that can be used as a source. It also creates some blank (dummy) files in case Tony does not have any new data in the directory. The processes iterate through each type of source: Diamond files, IRD Class files from the conversion program, IRD Speed files from the conversion program, IRD weight files
CreateBlankDiamondFile
echo off > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\BlankDiamondFile.dat
CreateDiamondClassFileList
dir /b "\\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\*.dat" > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\DiamondFilelist.txt
CreateBlankIRDClassFile
echo off > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\ClassBlankIRDFile.txt
CreateIRDClassFileList
dir /b "\\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\Class*.txt" > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\IRDClassFileList.txt
CreateBlankIRDFile
echo off > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\SpeedBlankIRDFile.txt
CreateIRDSpeedFileList
dir /b "\\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\Speed*.txt" > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\SpeedIRDFilelist.txt
CreateBlankWgtFile
echo off > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\BlankWeightFile.wgt
Create7CardFileList
dir /b "\\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\*.txt" > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\7CardFilelist.txt
TASK.NAME: cmdCreateIRDandDiamondFileList

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Fail task if any command fails
Fail task if any command fails

SESSION.DESCRIPTION:
Session connects to the file hwy.xnb.d250.ptrtable and stages the data in the data mart. Almost all ADC loads then lookup to the this table to decode the Traffic Collection Site. Table is used in mapplet ConvertStationID.
This session truncates and reloads each time.
Session may be deleted once the PTRTable has been placed in TARIS.
SESSION.NAME: s_stgPTRTable

SESSION.DESCRIPTION:
This session loads the TrafficCollectionSite dimension in the Traffic Data Mart. Sources: stgPTRTable, TARIS..Current_ADC_Site, and TARIS..ADC_Site_Hist.
Session is a Type 1 slowly changing dimension and as such inserts any new records and updates any changed records.
*/ Removed RTRIMs on 10/2/2017 and added expTrimStgPTRT Source stgPTRTable has the following SQL override to trim trailing spaces from data: SELECT RTRIM(stgPTRTable.PTR_NUM_1), stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG, RTRIM(stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG_DIRN1), stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG_DIRN1_CHANNEL, RTRIM(stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG_DIRN2), stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG_DIRN2_CHANNEL FROM stgPTRTable */
SESSION.NAME: s_TrafficCollectionSite

SESSION.DESCRIPTION:
Session set to truncate and reload table.
This session supports the need to summarize the data that is in the Class, Speed and Weight Tables. It utilizes a special lookup override forcing the server to do all of the aggregation and then passes through the data to be loaded into the summary table. The query override is:
SELECT YEARMO, TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID, MAX(TRAFFICVOLUME) AS TRAFFICVOLUME, MAX(CLASSNUMBEROFDAYS) AS CLASSNUMBEROFDAYS, MAX(SPEEDNUMBEROFDAYS) AS SPEEDNUMBEROFDAYS, MAX(WEIGHTNUMBEROFDAYS) AS WEIGHTNUMBEROFDAYS FROM ( SELECT B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID, SUM(A.TRAFFICVOLUME) AS TRAFFICVOLUME, COUNT (DISTINCT A.DATEID) AS CLASSNUMBEROFDAYS, null AS SPEEDNUMBEROFDAYS, null AS WEIGHTNUMBEROFDAYS FROM HOURLYVOLUME A INNER JOIN DATE B ON A.DATEID = B.DATEID GROUP BY B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID UNION SELECT B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID, NULL, null, COUNT (DISTINCT A.DATEID), null FROM HOURLYSPEED A INNER JOIN DATE B ON A.DATEID = B.DATEID GROUP BY B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID UNION SELECT B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID, NULL, NULL ,NULL, COUNT (DISTINCT A.DATEID) FROM HOURLYTRUCKWEIGHT A INNER JOIN DATE B ON A.DATEID = B.DATEID GROUP BY B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID) A GROUP BY YEARMO, TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID
SESSION.NAME: s_ADCTrafficSummary

Post SQL
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: truncate table [dbo].[ODS_AggregatedTruckWeights]; insert into ODS_AggregatedTruckWeights select stationid, DirectionOfTravel, LaneOfTravel, Year, Month, day, DateId, hour, vehicleclass , max(AAxleWeightinPounds) as FrontAxleMaximumWeight , sum(LoadedTrafficVolume) as LoadedTrafficVolume , sum(UnLoadedTrafficVolume) as UnloadedTrafficVolume , round(sum(totalvehicleWeightinPounds) / cast(Count(*) as float) , 0) as AverageGrossWeight , round(sum(LoadedTrafficVolume) /cast(Count(*) as float) *100, 0) as PercentLoaded , round((sum(UnLoadedTrafficVolume) / cast(Count(*) as float) *100), 0) as PercentEmpty , round(sum(AAxleWeightInPounds) / cast(count(*) as float) ,0) as FrontAxleAverageWeight , count(*) as TrafficVolume , sum(totalvehicleWeightinPounds) as TotalWeight from StagingTraffic..stg_truckweight where VehicleClass in ('04', '05','06','07','08','09','10','11','12','13','15') --and StationID='D1N' and dateid=20141001 and hour='00' group by stationid, DirectionOfTravel, LaneOfTravel, Year, Month, day, DateId, hour, VehicleClass order by 1,2,3, 4, 5,6, 7, 8, 9

Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION:
This command task runs the following commands in order to generate the file sources that will be used in subsequent sessions. Its purpose is to search through the InformaticaLoad directory that Tony populates and builds a list of all the files for that can be used as a source. It also creates some blank (dummy) files in case Tony does not have any new data in the directory. The processes iterate through each type of source: Diamond files, IRD Class files from the conversion program, IRD Speed files from the conversion program, IRD weight files
CreateBlankDiamondFile
echo off > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\BlankDiamondFile.dat
CreateDiamondClassFileList
dir /b "\\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\*.dat" > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\DiamondFilelist.txt
CreateBlankIRDClassFile
echo off > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\ClassBlankIRDFile.txt
CreateIRDClassFileList
dir /b "\\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\Class*.txt" > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\IRDClassFileList.txt
CreateBlankIRDFile
echo off > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\SpeedBlankIRDFile.txt
CreateIRDSpeedFileList
dir /b "\\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\Speed*.txt" > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\SpeedIRDFilelist.txt
CreateBlankWgtFile
echo off > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\BlankWeightFile.wgt
Create7CardFileList
dir /b "\\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\*.txt" > \\dottdowim\groups\WIM\DATA\TrafficDataMart\InformaticaLoad\7CardFilelist.txt
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: cmdCreateIRDandDiamondFileList

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION:
Session connects to the file hwy.xnb.d250.ptrtable and stages the data in the data mart. Almost all ADC loads then lookup to the this table to decode the Traffic Collection Site. Table is used in mapplet ConvertStationID.
This session truncates and reloads each time.
Session may be deleted once the PTRTable has been placed in TARIS.
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_stgPTRTable

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION:
This session loads the TrafficCollectionSite dimension in the Traffic Data Mart. Sources: stgPTRTable, TARIS..Current_ADC_Site, and TARIS..ADC_Site_Hist.
Session is a Type 1 slowly changing dimension and as such inserts any new records and updates any changed records.
*/ Removed RTRIMs on 10/2/2017 and added expTrimStgPTRT Source stgPTRTable has the following SQL override to trim trailing spaces from data: SELECT RTRIM(stgPTRTable.PTR_NUM_1), stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG, RTRIM(stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG_DIRN1), stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG_DIRN1_CHANNEL, RTRIM(stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG_DIRN2), stgPTRTable.PTR1_LEG_DIRN2_CHANNEL FROM stgPTRTable */
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_TrafficCollectionSite

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION:
Session reads from the source flat files in the New TMG formatted weight records and loads the Hourly Weight fact table.
Source: 7CardFileList.txt
Source is a file list, so the "Source File Type" has to be set to indirect. This means that the session is not just reading a single file, but is reading/processing all the files in the list.
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_TruckWeight

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Save session log for these runs

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Sends a success email message to the owner of the ADC side of the data mart when the load has completed.
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: SuccessEmailToCustomer

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION:
Session set to truncate and reload table.
This session supports the need to summarize the data that is in the Class, Speed and Weight Tables. It utilizes a special lookup override forcing the server to do all of the aggregation and then passes through the data to be loaded into the summary table. The query override is:
SELECT YEARMO, TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID, MAX(TRAFFICVOLUME) AS TRAFFICVOLUME, MAX(CLASSNUMBEROFDAYS) AS CLASSNUMBEROFDAYS, MAX(SPEEDNUMBEROFDAYS) AS SPEEDNUMBEROFDAYS, MAX(WEIGHTNUMBEROFDAYS) AS WEIGHTNUMBEROFDAYS FROM ( SELECT B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID, SUM(A.TRAFFICVOLUME) AS TRAFFICVOLUME, COUNT (DISTINCT A.DATEID) AS CLASSNUMBEROFDAYS, null AS SPEEDNUMBEROFDAYS, null AS WEIGHTNUMBEROFDAYS FROM HOURLYVOLUME A INNER JOIN DATE B ON A.DATEID = B.DATEID GROUP BY B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID UNION SELECT B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID, NULL, null, COUNT (DISTINCT A.DATEID), null FROM HOURLYSPEED A INNER JOIN DATE B ON A.DATEID = B.DATEID GROUP BY B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID UNION SELECT B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID, NULL, NULL ,NULL, COUNT (DISTINCT A.DATEID) FROM HOURLYTRUCKWEIGHT A INNER JOIN DATE B ON A.DATEID = B.DATEID GROUP BY B.YEARMO, A.TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID) A GROUP BY YEARMO, TRAFFICCOLLECTIONSITEID
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_ADCTrafficSummary

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Sends a success email message to the programmer of the ADC side of the data mart when the load has completed.
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: SuccessEmailToProgrammer
